price: Moreover, they have a charge against me, so I fear they may kill me[4].”
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ
footnotes: [4] For killing a Coptic Egyptian by mistake before becoming a prophet.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
